code: import{SCALE_MODES}from'@pixi/constants';import{Texture}from'@pixi/core';import{Nitro}from'../../nitro/Nitro';export class TextureUtils{static generateTexture(displayObject){let region=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;let scaleMode=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:SCALE_MODES.NEAREST;let resolution=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:1;if(!displayObject)return null;return this.getRenderer().generateTexture(displayObject,{scaleMode,resolution,region});}static generateTextureFromImage(image){if(!image)return null;return Texture.from(image);}static generateImage(target){if(!target)return null;return this.getExtractor().image(target);}static generateImageUrl(target){if(!target)return null;return this.getExtractor().base64(target);}static generateCanvas(target){if(!target)return null;return this.getExtractor().canvas(target);}static getRenderer(){return Nitro.instance.renderer;}static getExtractor(){return this.getRenderer().plugins.extract;}}
